name: key-stone
effect: Allows the player’s Pokémon to Mega Evolve.
short_effect: Allows the player’s Pokémon to Mega Evolve.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A stone filled with an unexplained power. It makes Pokémon that battle with a Mega Stone Mega Evolve.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A stone filled with an unexplained power. It makes Pokémon that battle with a Mega Stone Mega Evolve.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A stone filled with an unexplained power. It reacts to Mega Stones and makes Pokémon Mega Evolve.
